basic_info.title: Group of Brazilian Universities (GCUB) Scholarship 2025 (800 Scholarships)
basic_info.author: Muhammad Saim Rasheed
basic_info.program_name: Group of Brazilian Universities (GCUB – International Mobility Program)

program_details.description:
Most awaited Scholarship to **Study in South America**. The applications are open to apply for the **Group of Brazilian Universities (GCUB) Scholarship 2025**. The GCUB Brazil Scholarship is a program offered by the **55** Group of Brazilian Universities (GCUB). International students can apply for the **Masters** and **PhD** degree programs in any of the 55 Universities of Brazil. Participate in one of the largest international scholarship programs. There is no need for any acceptance letter not to contact any professor.

The table of the **Master’s and PhD degree programs** contains information on the university, language requirements, and duration of the program. Please use the Google Translate if the language is not English. The duration of the Master’s program is up to 24 months and the duration of the Doctoral program is up to 48 months. More details about the scholarship coverage, eligibility criteria, and the application process are given below.

financial_coverage: Exemption from paying enrollment fees, tuition, or academic fees.
A Monthly Stipend to cover the living expenses for the full duration of the program.

required_documents: Copy of Passport or any other identity document
Copy of all previous educational certificates, diplomas, transcripts, and degrees.

Submit an essay and follow the structure:
* Font: Times New Roman
* Size 12;
* Line spacing of 1.5 cm and margins (top, bottom, right, and left) of 2.5 cm
